<p>These are things that I would like to do before I die. I started this running list when I was in middle school. For the longest time I was ashamed of many of the things on this list - hence I'd suggest keeping the disclaimer that I wrote a lot of these when I was quite young. However, in tribute to Charu from the past, I always keep them on the list and will try accomplishing them :) </p><p>The one's in <strong>bold</strong> have been completed when last updated. </p><ul><li><strong>Visit the Taj Mahal</strong></li><li><strong>Watch a Live Sports Match</strong></li><li>Travel to Sikkim</li><li>Live Abroad</li><li><strong>Learn Mandarin</strong></li><li><strong>Go to Pakistan </strong></li><li><strong>Visit Udaipur for Holi</strong></li><li><a href="__GHOST_URL__/states-ut-checklist/">Travel across every state and UT in India</a></li><li><strong>Watch a Live Comedy Show</strong></li><li><strong>Save X amount of money</strong></li><li><strong>Try Bhaang</strong></li><li><strong>Be confident in the way I look</strong></li><li>Do standup comedy</li><li>Wear a <a href="data:image/jpeg;base64,">tape only dress </a></li><li>Get in an ambulance consciously</li><li>Fly in a hot air balloon</li><li>Stay in a prison cell or police lockup</li><li>Achieve Financial Independance</li><li>Travel to Vietnam</li><li><strong>Romantically read a bed time story to somebody</strong></li><li><strong>Cook a fancy meal for the family</strong></li><li><strong>Go to a live concert</strong></li><li><strong>Fall in Love</strong></li><li><strong>Be part of building a product</strong></li><li>Try hand at something entrepreneurial</li><li>Work a service job</li><li>Backpack across Europe</li><li>Climb stairway to heaven</li><li>Watch a Live Play</li><li>Watch Thrissur Pooram</li><li>Go to Antarctica - Watch penguins</li><li>Hold a Garage Sale</li><li>Gatecrash a wedding</li><li>Shave my head</li><li>Get a Guinness World record in something</li><li>Have a really petty breakup</li><li><strong>Run 5k </strong></li><li><strong>Run 10k</strong></li><li><strong>Run a half marathon </strong></li><li><strong>Run a marathon</strong></li><li><strong>Attend a full north Indian shaadi</strong></li><li>Get in a helicopter consciously</li><li>Go sugar-free for a month</li><li>Retrieve and publish family archives</li><li>Speak Arabic</li><li>Speak Spanish</li><li><strong>Finish a trek</strong></li><li>Learn Photography</li><li>Do a cart wheel</li><li>Learn Boxing</li><li><strong>Become a <a href="https://tatamumbaimarathon.procam.in/about-us/procam-slam" rel="noreferrer">Procam Slam Champion</a></strong></li><li>Learn Gymnastics</li><li>Learn to write code </li><li>Prep &amp; train for an Ironman</li><li>Attend the Alma do Vinho</li><li>Run the Marathon du MÃ¨doc</li><li>Make my own furniture </li><li><strong>Paragliding</strong></li><li>Skydiving</li><li><strong>Snorkeling </strong></li><li><strong>Celebrate Songkran</strong></li></ul><p></p>
